trans-unit.source: Represents an interoperable binding that derives from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref> and provides support for the updated versions of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security*>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession"></xref>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow*> binding elements.
trans-unit.target: 파생 되는 상호 운용 가능한 바인딩을 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"> </xref> 의 업데이트 된 버전에 대 한 지원을 제공 하 고는 <> </> *>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession"> </xref>, 및 <> </> *> 바인딩 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The WS2007HttpBinding class adds a system-provided binding similar to <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> but uses the Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards (OASIS) standard versions of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow%2A> protocols.
trans-unit.target: 과 비슷한 시스템 제공 바인딩을 추가 하는 WS2007HttpBinding 클래스 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>하지만 Organization Advancement의 구조화 된 정보 표준 OASIS () 표준 버전의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A>, 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow%2A>프로토콜.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBindingBase.TransactionFlow%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableSession> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the object model or default settings are required when using this binding.
trans-unit.target: 이 바인딩을 사용할 때는 개체 모델이 나 기본 설정이 변경 되지 됩니다 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class.

This constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding> class and sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol> properties that specify the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and WS-I Basic Security Profile 1.0 security protocols.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자의 인스턴스를 초기화 합니다.는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding>클래스 및 집합은 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion>, 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol>Ws-security 1.1, Ws-trust 1.3, Ws-secureconversation 1.3, Ws-securitypolicy 1.2 및 WS를 지정 하는 속성-Basic Security Profile 1.0 보안 프로토콜.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion> </xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"> </xref> 클래스는 지정 된 바인딩에 사용 되는 보안 형식 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: 값 <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>클라이언트와 SOAP 메시지와 함께 사용 되는 보안 형식을 지정 하.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"> </xref> 구성 이름으로 지정 된 바인딩 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 바인딩 구성 이름은 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WS2007HttpBindingElement"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The binding element with the name configName was not found.
trans-unit.target: 이름으로 바인딩 요소 configName 찾을 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding"> </xref> 클래스는 지정 된 신뢰할 수 있는 세션을 사용할지 여부를 나타내는 값과 바인딩에서 사용 되는 보안 형식 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding> class and sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol> properties that specify the WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and WS-I Basic Security Profile 1.0 security protocols.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자의 인스턴스를 초기화 합니다.는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding>클래스 및 집합은 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion>, 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol>Ws-security 1.1, Ws-trust 1.3, Ws-secureconversation 1.3, Ws-securitypolicy 1.2 및 WS를 지정 하는 속성-Basic Security Profile 1.0 보안 프로토콜.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion> </xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WS2007HttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: 값 <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>클라이언트와 SOAP 메시지와 함께 사용 되는 보안 형식을 지정 하.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>신뢰할 수 있는 세션을 사용 하면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the security binding element from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: 현재 바인딩의 보안 바인딩 요소를 반환합니다.
